attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The bbc show advertisements from countless tourist authorities, car manufacturers and other entities on their "bbc world" channel, transmitted by other stations, in other countries.
The revenue obtained is surely financing our own "bbc". Can this not be extended, thus saving the collection and administration caused.
The licence fee, we understand, creates only 2% of the bbc's total revenue.
All information received, i.e.news, is freely available elsewhere. Why should the bbc be sponsored in this way by the government?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
